main event: On July 8, 1964, multiple witnesses reported seeing an unidentified flying object hovering over Cape Girardeau, Missouri.
interesting points: The object was described as disc-shaped and approximately 40 feet in diameter., It had a smooth metallic surface with no visible means of propulsion., Witnesses reported that the object emitted a bright white light and made no sound., The sighting lasted for about 15 to 20 minutes before the object accelerated rapidly and disappeared., Witness accounts included seeing humanoid figures near the object during other incidents in the same area.
witness description: local residents and officials, including a police officer and civilian witnesses
